content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a real gem in the city center, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience of its location. Now, about the rental price, I was thinking somewhere around 2,000 Euros a month. Don't rush to respond. I'm sure you'll find it's worth every penny.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, but I think the price is too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable. Would you be willing to lower the price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I can understand your situation. Let's say, 1,500 Euros a month. It's a fair price for a unit of this quality, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the value. Remember, location, location, location!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. However, I think we can still find a better deal. Can you go any lower?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, Maryam, I do appreciate your persistence. Let's say, 1,200 Euros a month. It's a very reasonable price, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the value. Remember, the location of this apartment is hard to beat!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more like it. I think we are getting closer to an agreement. Can you do any better?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I do appreciate your business. Let's say, 1,000 Euros a month. It's a very reasonable price, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the value. Remember, the location of this apartment is hard to beat!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds much better. I think we can agree on that price. I agree to the price of 1,000 Euros!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1,000] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am sure I will be very happy in this apartment. Let's proceed with the contract signing.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
